scripts.generateBinaries: mkdir -p bin && rm -f bin/* && pkg js/server.js --targets latest-linux-x64,latest-macos-x64,latest-win-x64 --out-path bin/
scripts.renameBinaries: mv bin/server-linux bin/xfer-linux && mv bin/server-macos bin/xfer-macos && mv bin/server-win.exe bin/xfer-win.exe
scripts.buildBinaries: npm run compileToJs && npm run generateBinaries && npm run renameBinaries
